website_summaries.verdict: The Denon AVR-S750H offers generous sound quality, plenty of connectivity options
pros: The Denon AVR-S750H offers excellent home theater performance in an affordable, up-to-date package
It supports numerous wireless standards including Bluetooth in/out, Apple's AirPlay 2 and Denon's own HEOS
Voice control is available from Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant
cons: The black and white interface is woefully outdated compared to rivals
The previous model was a little more accomplished with music

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Had for 4 months. Woke up one day to an update error. Essentially bricked the unit. I would expect a new one to be sent out as replacement and they get the old one back. Nope. You send it off and wait for it to be repaired. I will not buy another denon product.
customer_reviews.author: bert deaton

customer_reviews.title: Save time and money...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had nothing but trouble since purchasing this product. When it actually works, it works well, but when there’s something wrong it’s almost impossible to fix because customer service is so awful. You will wait for almost an hour to talk to someone and they will fix it if you pay a fee to ship it to them. They’ll send it back and another issue will arise. Save your money and time and find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lentini

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver, look no further
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this receiver! I am running it in a 5.1.2 setup. All the forums out there that state you cannot do Atmos over ARC also don’t know what they are taking about. It’s true that you cannot do DolbyTrueHD over ARC, but atmos is metadata added to an encoding, so yes you can get atmos over ARC
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shedlock

customer_reviews.title: Denon receiver stop working after 7 months!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months the device does not turn on. I have to pay for all the repair shipment. Because it is an heavy device, shipment costs 50% of the total cost. This is ridiculous. The device was Always handled with care. Will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packs in a lot of features for the $, but failed after only a few hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, Audyssey works surprisingly well, assignable amp channels for zone 2. Does a lot for the price. BUT, the front left amplifier channel failed after only a few hours of use. Fortunately it happened within Amazon's return window. Also, the bluetooth reception is very poor. It was breaking up from 10 feet away in the same room regardless of source device. If you plan on using it for multizone purposes, note that you are very limited as to what sources may be used for the second zone. No HDMI/Toslink/Coax SPDIF support for Zone 2 source.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondPilot

customer_reviews.title: Better than a soundbar and easy to integrate with Vizio TV
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Vizio TV in the basement that I needed to pair with a Bose speaker system. This system exceeded all of my expectations. Pros IPad apps enable extended remote control options with a variety of music streaming options under a single account Test/Setup functions use microphone to easily setup new system and identify potential problems Great sound! Cons Your TV remote may not integrate seamlessly with the system
customer_reviews.author: Deltapez

customer_reviews.title: Great Amp/Receiver
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Onkyo I bought in 2015 with this Denon. Denon AVR-S750H met my expectation completely. I like the warm rich sound that it produces. It plenty of power for my theater room. Gives you many options for types of sound fields and speaker configurations etc. I like the simpler remote that Denon provides rather than my Onkyo remote. I would never buy anything but a Denon or Onkyo for my listening experience. Denon has found a new friend in me.
customer_reviews.author: hclinde

customer_reviews.title: A fine receiver that solved my TV video problem
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give this receiver the techno analysis that would be more meaningful because I am not capable of doing that. But this receiver solved a problem I was having with an 8-year old Onkyo receiver causing picture ripples in the video reception through my cable box. No one was able to quite accurately diagnose the cause of this problem but, in the end, it turned out to be something to do with how the receiver was handling that particular signal. Thank you, Denon! And this receiver provides excellent sound to my surround sound speakers and offers easy-to-understand settings.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solved my speaker zone problem
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality receiver for my surround sound system that would let me run sound to a second set of speakers on my outside deck without having the main surround speakers on. Once I downloaded the 2 recommended apps to my phone, I am able to easily control the system from my phone. I can now listen to TV, music, etc. on my deck while my wife watches TV in the living room (or there can be no sound on the main system). It performs very well. And sounds incredible. I replaced an 8 year old Sony receiver with this Denon. I could not believe how much the sound quality improved with the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! I had this device for 3 days. I initially set it up, worked great. Turned it off at night. Turned it back on the next day, No Sound! Re-did setup, sound worked. Turned it off and back on again, no sound. Every time I wanted sound I had to re-do the setup. Finally went into setup again, and setup froze completely. Turned it back of. And on again, setup froze completely. Wash, rinse repeat. No good. Let setup run in frozen state for 1 hour, turned it off and Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, you’re not going to find a much better receiver. It accomplishes most everything I want out of a receiver and more. It is a bit clunky to control at times.
customer_reviews.author: ADantzMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Denon 4k receiver
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this unit from a Denon AVR 2312 CI as I now have a Sony 4k blue ray and a Samsung 4k television, now that I have it hooked up with Bose surround front & rear speakers Sony tower front speakers Sony sub and center speakers, it sounds great, no technical issues what so ever, my 4k movies are spectacular!
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Exellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Great avr sound are terrific. THIS MY FIRST EVER DENON
customer_reviews.author: Michael edillor

customer_reviews.title: Does it all!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this receiver. It does everything I need!
customer_reviews.author: adriene rae kenepp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have never own anything by denon receivers.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Newman

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive receiver
customer_reviews.text: Set-up was made easier with the on-screen tutorial. Unable to calibrate speakers with furnished microphone. Called Denon support and received competent assistance. They are sending a new calibration microphone. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Simons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed to setup my surround sound
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far but have not setup the setting quite done yet. Don’t have time to do it yet. But I had tested the receiver and everything work good.
customer_reviews.author: jaime nubla

customer_reviews.title: Geek Squad put it in
customer_reviews.text: I use this device for home theater. The Geek Squad put it in. Working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Garry McKellips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound distribution
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this receiver immerses you into the movie with its perfect distribution of sound. With my old receiver I new where the sounds were coming from. This one is very intelligent you don’t have to adjust it like old 5.1 receivers. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: John Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Poor Support
customer_reviews.text: Very good, feature rich, A/V Receiver. Difficult setup to an old Dumb Monitor TV. Users Manual didn't download correctly. Customer support couldn't help and suggested I buy a new TV. Eventually I updated it's software, reset and restarted the setup process again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Denon make a good product and this one is no exception. Easy to set up easy to configure works perfectly with multi-zonei run a 7.2 sound system or 5.2 with second zone
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Alan Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Often we think of buying an amplifier for audio quality only. Well, that is a mistake. This amp will provide incredible sound along with improved video resolution that must be see to be believed. I replaced an aging AVR-1912, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and get going good quality
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounding HDMI reciever.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy affordable upgrade to full hdmi setup. Automagic sound configuration worked a charm. Better sound through original speaker setup.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: Denon AVR-750H a great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice receiver great value and on screen set up is top notch
customer_reviews.author: ronald hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. Only problem I am still having is trying to figure out why I am not getting any volume through my Bluetooth from my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.S

customer_reviews.title: It arrive the next day after I order it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for your home and it arrive earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade after my five year old receiver failed. Very impressed with the sound performance and technology.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hemmelgarn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best AV receiver I've ever owned I've ever owned. The sound is phenomenal the apps were great. These have set up and use are awesome. Put the price of this AV receiver It's well worth the money. I highly recommend it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Langford

customer_reviews.title: Not really a user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not really a user friendly..that's why I returned after 3 days..I will be replacing it with yamaha
customer_reviews.author: No one

customer_reviews.title: No complaints,
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was looking for, Sound is incredible, seamless interface, setup was a little tricky but that’s part of the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Les Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace an older receiver that wasn't playing audio. This was the perfect receiver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Garbage customer service on 3 days old product
customer_reviews.text: Atmos setting had a popping sound coming from Speakers, changed speakers to troubleshoot. Problem persists. Called Denon 2 hours on hold. Finally got a tech, had very little knowledge of product and couldn’t help. Said receiver is defective... Basically said call Best Buy where purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Gw

customer_reviews.title: Nice receiver
customer_reviews.text: Just got the AVR-S750 Saturday, the receiver is very easy to use and very easy to connect to your other components. Connecting my Iphone 11 by blue tooth was seamless, no issues. The sound quality with my Klipsh speakers is good. So far after 2 days I'm very happy with the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Paprocki

product_meta.title: Denon AVR-S750H Receiver, 7.2 Channel (165W x 7) - 4K Ultra HD Home Theater (2019) | Music Streaming | New - eARC, 3D Dolby Surround Sound (Atmos, DTS/Virtual Height Elevation) | Alexa + HEOS
product_meta.description: Power truly immersive home theater experiences with the Denon AVR-S750H. Enter the action with Dolby Atmos, Dolby Atmos height virtualization technology, DTS:X and DTS Virtual:X. The AVR-S750H features an advanced HDMI section (6 inputs/1 Output) and the latest video technologies including Dolby Vision, HDR10, HOG and eARC support. Play your MP3, WAV, FLAC, ALAC and DSD (2.8/5.6MHz) files via the front-panel USB, or stream Spotify, Pandora, Tidal and more with HEOS wireless multi-room music streaming technology. Works with Apple Airplay 2, Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant for seamless voice control. Get set up in minutes with the award-winning Denon setup assistant.
feature_bullets: UNPRECEDENTED REALISM AND NEW FEATURES – eARC and heightened sound effects with Dolby Atmos Height Virtualization Technology. Be it the sound of a helicopter or torrential rains – it’ll sound so real, you'll think it's happening right above you

MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR NEW 4K ULTRA HD TV with this 7.2 channel stereo receiver. Featuring HLG, HDR10, BT.2020, Wide Color Gamut & 4:4:4 Pure Color sub-sampling, it DELIVERS EXCEPTIONAL BRIGHTNESS, CONTRAST & COLOR enriching your movie and gaming experience

EXTEND THE REACH OF YOUR MUSIC to any room in the house via Wi-Fi, Airplay or Bluetooth with HEOS MULTI-ROOM WIRELESS SPEAKERS – No Command Center or extra hardware required. Get Hi-Fi sound around your home with Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, Deezer & more

FULL VOICE CONTROL COMPATIBILITY WITH AMAZON ALEXA lets you sit back and enjoy music without having to reach out for the remote. Adjust the volume, change the track or switch the inputs absolutely hands-free

AWARD-WINNING ON-SCREEN SETUP ASSISTANT walks you through clear simple instructions to connect your TV, specific EQ settings & helps you optimize your surround sound. Denon's legacy & Japanese precision technology makes it a must-have for your home

All HDMI ports (6 In, 1 out) follow the LATEST REVISION TO HIGH-BANDWIDTH DIGITAL CONTENT PROTECTION REQUIREMENTS (HDCP 2.3) & are also backward compatible with the earlier versions. Don't fret if your devices have HDCP 2.2 - they'll work perfectly well

SMOOTH, SOOTHING, CLEAR SOUND EVERY SINGLE TIME – During setup, the Audyssey Suite – an EQ calibration system – measures & dynamically optimizes all speakers in your home theatre for all listening levels. No sudden blasts or muffled dialogues anymore

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
